node.title: Homes That Sold for Around $1.5 Million
node.description: Recent residential sales in New York City and the region.
node.content: ["Each week, our survey of recent residential sales in New York City and the surrounding region focuses on homes that sold around a certain price point, allowing you to compare single-family homes, condos and co-ops in different locales.", "The \u201clist price\u201d is the asking price when the property came on the market with the most recent broker. The time on the market is measured from the most recent listing to the closing date of the sale.", "This two-family, 2,090-square-foot, attached prewar rowhouse has a two-bedroom, one bath unit atop a one-bedroom, two-bath duplex with a finished basement, plus a deck and pergola-shaded backyard, on a 20-by-100-foot lot.", "17 weeks on the market", "$1,625,000 list price", "1% above list price", "Costs $7,632 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Corcoran Group", "A 3,678-square-foot colonial-style house built in 1812, with a living room that has two fireplaces, a kitchen with granite counters, and a barn with a pair of one-bedroom apartments, on almost four acres.", "13 weeks on the market", "$1,595,000 list price", "1% below list price", "Costs $19,205 a year in taxes", "Listing broker William Pitt Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "This 61-year-old, 2,222-square-foot, ranch-style house has a living room with a fireplace and vaulted ceiling, a kitchen with a picture window and exposed brick wall, and a finished basement on an acre.", "14 weeks on the market", "$1,098,000 list price", "18% above list price", "Costs $18,984 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Douglas Elliman", "This 91-year-old, 3,095-square-foot house has a kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and a wine refrigerator, a formal dining room with built-in cabinets and an attached one-car garage on 0.39 acres.", "16 weeks on the market", "$1,195,000 list price", "3% below list price", "Costs $20,765 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Julia B. Fee Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "A 33-year-old, 1,123-square-foot condo, with hardwood floors, a living room with a door to a balcony, a windowed kitchen, five closets and a primary suite in a doorman elevator building with a roof deck.", "17 weeks on the market", "$1,425,000 list price", "8% below list price", "Costs $1,746 a month in common charges; $1,221 a month in taxes; $152 a month in special assessments through 2022", "Listing broker Brown Harris Stevens", "A 3,668-square-foot house built in 1904, with a living room that has a fireplace and window seat, a dining room with a fireplace, a kitchen with a breakfast bar, and a pool, on 0.79 acres.", "33 weeks on the market [assumes 2-2 to 9-17, owing to \u201ccoming soon\u201d feature]", "$1,740,000 list price", "17% below list price", "Costs $27,872 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Weichert, Realtors"]
